title: Lewis Pullman
summary: Lewis James Pullman (born January 29, 1993) is an American actor. His film credits include The Strangers: Prey at Night, Bad Times at the El Royale (both 2018), and Top Gun: Maverick (2022). On television, he starred as Major Major Major Major in Catch-22 and Rhett Abbott in Outer Range. His upcoming projects include the lead role in the film adaptation of Stephen King's 'Salem's Lot.
